El primer Portal me sorprendió con una historia sencilla pero inmersiva, con personajes icónicos y mucho humor.
Esta secuela para nada se queda atrás, rescata las dinámicas de juego y humor del primer Portal y las lleva a un nuevo nivel, muchas horas más de juego y giros en la trama que lo vuelven totalmente recomendable.

Portal 2 is better than Portal 1 in every way. It's a fantastic game full of hilarious jokes! Longer than the first game, it also have a good story and new puzzle mechanics. You can also create your own levels and share them online. 10/10. I recommend it!

This is hands down the best Puzzle game ever. It's got everything a quality game needs. It's funny. It's nice to look at. Unique gameplay. Multiplayer. Amazing writing. Great Story. IT. IS. AMAZING. BUY IT NAO.

Игра действительно заставляет задуматься, куда поставить этот чёртов портал, чтобы упала та штука вон на ту штуку и открылась та штука из которой должна выпасть эта штука и упасть на ту штуку, оттолкунуться от нее, перелететь через воду и упасть на ту штуку, которая откроет дверь, до которой вам нужно дойти, проделав всё в обратном порядке.
Так я, человек нелогичный, представляю себе эту игру.

Portal 2 is the perfect, if not better, sequel to the original portal game (intended as an add on to the orange box) it brings over the best of mechanics and comedy from the original, and makes it better. withh the introduction of wheatley and the new jells, you are guaranteed to have a memorably great time moving through the well made puzzles this game has to offer.

Portal, sin duda desde la entrega anterior se habia vuelto uno de mis juegos favoritos, y con la llegada de esta obra maestra, quede totalmente atonito a la maravilla que es, tuvo una historia mas profunda, mayor drama, mayor humor, incluyendo ahora la musica, joder, la musica detras de cada momento y prueba era lo que ya cambio el ambiente en portal, portal se lleno de mas contenido, mejores pruebas, y aun siendo un tanto mas corto que el anterior es una maravilla y en mi punto mejoro realmente. Recomendado en verdad, me quede picado en saber que me esperaba y que pasaba con los personajes. Buen juego.

Possibly the best game i have on steam. even though i beat it the co-op is great even if you are forever alone. with most games i dont repeat levels but portal makes it so interactive that i just want to replay it again. and unlike the first game the storyline was so much more in-depth. i reccomend this game to anyone wanting to challenge themselves with a fin series of puzzles.

This game is a game that everyone should play. It is my most favorite game of all time. I can not stop replaying it.

Portal was a clever little game that managed to surprise with brilliantly innovative gameplay, a memorable villain, and quite a bit of humor. Having always enjoyed the "mysterious organization doing apparently pointless testing on humans"-angle, from the Vault-Tech vaults in Fallout and the Dharma Initiative in LOST, Aperture Science and its apparent custodian, GLaDOS, tickled a nerve with me from the very beginning.

And like all popular games, we got a sequel.

Fans of Valve's games have often made a point of discussion that the company is notorious for NOT making sequels to their games (beyond the 2. installment anyways). Half Life 3, Left for Dead 3 and Portal 3 are all games fans have been requesting for years now, with no announcements that they're even being worked on.

The reason I mention this, is because I think it's a testement to Valves integrity that they refuse to take the easy cash-grab route with their beloved franchises. Portal 2 is most definately a game that both builds upon the first game, keeping what was great about it, and adds enough new content to distinguish itself as something great all on its own.

The prototype of Portal 1 started life as a student-made Half-Life mod, and from those humble beginnings, Portal 2 retains that crazy indie-game feel and ambition whilst also shining with all the polish and production value of a AAA-game. The basic schtick of opening portals to play with 3D-space is complimented by the addition of three different gels that show up mid-game and add new layers to the puzzles. The puzzles range from the easy, introductory ones, to the "what kind of mad genious DESIGNED this sh**?"-variety. Some of the levels had me stumped for quite some time - but they never felt unfair or misleading, and because of that, progress brought with it a wonderful sense of accomplishment.

As I've already said, the story - though somewhat sparse - in Portal 1 was one of my favorite aspects of that game, and Portal 2 expands the mythology tenfolds. The new characters introduced are all engaging, interesting and funny - and GLaDOS remains a wonderfully entertaining, brilliantly executed and perfectly acted character. The graphics look great on my rig, the music is perfect, and the gameplay is brilliant.

With the stupendous backlog of games I have bought but yet to finish (or even "play"), there are only a small handful of games I play again after I've completed them. Portal 2 is one of those games. Maybe because I enjoy the gameplay, maybe because I enjoy the story, or just maybe because I am truly stuck in GLaDOS' compulsion to keep testing.

And I have yet to try my hand at the very promising multiplayer-mode, or look into Steams workshop of player-made content.

So if you haven't already, I wholeheartedly reccommend you try Portal 1 and Portal 2.

Yep, it's the best game on Steam. My only beef is that the only controller supported on Mac (I don't know about Windows) is the Xbox 360 controller.

Everything else about the game is awesome. The puzzles are great fun, the play control is spot on, the script is great.

Stephen Merchant as Wheatley is "brilliant." In fact, all the voice acting is way better than 90% of other games out there. Ellen McLain is great as GLaDOS.

Play this game!

Игра просто дикий трэш! Эта игра блядь сложнее ЕГЭ! Пока я играл в эту игру у меня 10 рак взорвался мозг! Так как в коопе просто пиздец какие дикие уровни! А так в игре хороший графон и движок, моя оценка 8/10.
It's a neat puzzle game.

Отличное продолжение первой части. Valve в очередной раз доказала что может делать хорошие игры когда козалось бы уже все изьежжено до дыр. Однако портал 2 это очередной шедевр. Старый знакомый голос главного компьютера услышав который я чуть не прослезился. Юмор твоего напарника да и вообще все происходящее. Новые возможности с гелем хорошо расширили механику и это здорово. Игра стала длиннее, отлаженней. Кажется будто Valve отполировали до блеска 1 портал добавили еще изюминку и получили вторую часть ставшую шедевром.
Итог 10\10. Однозначно к прохождению. Позволяет великолепно провести время.
